Get Help

Urgent Help? Contact Now!

Call to our Emergency Hotlines:

Agency Hotline Specialized For
National Emergency Hotline 911 Immediate assistance for emergencies, including GBV and VAWC
Philippine National Police (PNP) 0998-598-6688 Women and children experiencing abuse or violence
Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD) 0918-912-2813 Individuals and families in crisis situations
NBI VAWC Desk (02) 8525-6028 Legal investigation and case filing for VAWC survivors
Women’s Crisis Center (02) 8926-7744 Women survivors needing medical, psychological, or legal support
Bantay Bata 163 163 Children who are abused or in danger

Legal Help

Know Your Rights under RA 9262
Violence against women and children includes:

  • Physical, sexual, psychological, and economic abuse
  • Harassment and stalking
  • Partner abuse

How To File a Case

Shelter & Protection

Temporary Shelters

  • Operated by DSWD, LGUs, and NGOs
  • Free accommodation, meals, support
  • Includes therapy and legal aid

Not Ready To Share Your Identity?

If you're feeling afraid, unsure, or not yet ready to speak openly about what happened, you can choose to report anonymously. These options allow you to alert authorities or support organizations without revealing your personal information — helping you stay safe while still seeking help.
